mapper.select: SELECT BAS.F16013 ,BAS.F16002 ,BAS.LARGE_TYPE ,BAS.MIDDLE_TYPE ,HIS.F12506 ,HIS.F15009 ,HIS.F15010 ,HIS.F15011 ,HIS.F15001 ,HIS.F15472 ,HIS.F15006 ,HIS.F15004 ,HIS.F15015 ,HIS.F15023 FROM (SELECT * FROM kc_etp.td_index_basic WHERE F16013 = (SELECT MAX(F16013) FROM kc_etp.td_index_basic WHERE large_type=#{large_type} ) ) BAS, kc_etp.td_index_hist HIS WHERE BAS.F16013 = HIS.F16013 AND BAS.LARGE_TYPE = #{large_type} AND BAS.MARKET_ID = HIS.MARKET_ID ORDER BY HIS.F12506 DESC limit 0, 1

SELECT A.JISU_CD ,A.JISU_NM ,date_format(A.IP_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') IP_DT ,if(A.ANNO_DATE is null, '미발표', '발표') ANNO_YN ,A.INDEX_CAL_METHOD ,A.MARKET_ID ,A.ETP_MARKET_ID ,A.INST_CNT ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(F16002) FROM td_etp_basic WHERE F34239 = A.ETP_MARKET_ID AND F16257 = A.JISU_CD) as ETP_NM FROM (SELECT BAS.F16013 JISU_CD ,BAS.F16002 JISU_NM ,BAS.F12506 IP_DT ,BAS.ANNO_DATE ,BAS.INDEX_CAL_METHOD ,BAS.MARKET_ID ,CAST(substr(BAS.MARKET_ID, 2) AS SIGNED) ETP_MARKET_ID ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kc_etp.tm_jisu_share_req WHERE JISU_ID = BAS.F16013 AND REQ_FLAG = '2') INST_CNT FROM td_index_basic BAS WHERE large_type = #{large_type}) A;

WITH JISU AS (SELECT A.F16013 FROM (SELECT basic.F16013, (select max(b.F15009) from (select MIN(F12506) as F12506, F16013 from td_index_hist WHERE F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY F16013) a left join td_index_hist b on a.F16013 = b.F16013 and a.F12506 = b.F12506 where a.F16013 = basic.F16013 and b.F15001 is not null ) minData, (select max(b.F15009) from (select MAX(F12506) as F12506, F16013 from td_index_hist WHERE F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY F16013) a left join td_index_hist b on a.F16013 = b.F16013 and a.F12506 = b.F12506 where a.F16013 = basic.F16013 and b.F15001 is not null ) maxData FROM td_index_basic basic WHERE basic.large_type=#{large_type} ) A group by F16013 order by max(ifnull(A.maxData/A.minData, 0)) desc limit 0, 1) SELECT BAS.F16013 ,BAS.F16002 ,BAS.LARGE_TYPE ,BAS.MIDDLE_TYPE ,HIS.F12506 ,HIS.F15009 ,HIS.F15010 ,HIS.F15011 ,HIS.F15001 ,HIS.F15472 ,HIS.F15006 ,HIS.F15004 ,HIS.F15015 ,HIS.F15023 FROM (SELECT A.F16013 ,A.F16002 ,A.LARGE_TYPE ,A.MIDDLE_TYPE ,A.MARKET_ID FROM kc_etp.td_index_basic A, JISU B WHERE A.F16013 = B.F16013 ) BAS, kc_etp.td_index_hist HIS WHERE BAS.F16013 = HIS.F16013 AND BAS.MARKET_ID = HIS.MARKET_ID AND BAS.large_type=#{large_type} ORDER BY HIS.F12506 DESC limit 0, 1;

SELECT a.F12506 as trd_dd, a.F15009 as close_idx FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN td_index_basic b on a.F16013 = b.F16013 and a.market_id = b.market_id and b.large_type = #{large_type} WHERE a.F12506 >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y%m%d') AND a.F16013 = #{JISU_ID}

SELECT date_format(BAS.F12506, "%Y.%m.%d") F12506 ,BAS.F16013 ,BAS.F16002 ,BAS.F15009 ,BAS.F15010 ,BAS.F15011 ,format(BAS.F15001, '###,###,###') F15001 ,format(BAS.F15007, '###,###,###') F15007 ,format(BAS.F15015, '###,###,###') F15015 ,format(BAS.F15023, '###,###,###') F15023 ,BAS.F15472 ,BAS.F15004 ,BAS.F15006 ,format(BAS.F15028, '###,###,###') F15028 ,BAS.LARGE_TYPE ,BAS.MIDDLE_TYPE ,BAS.MARKET_ID ,BAS.STD_INDEX ,date_format(BAS.STD_DATE, "%Y.%m.%d") STD_DATE ,date_format(BAS.ANNO_DATE, "%Y.%m.%d") ANNO_DATE ,BAS.INDEX_CAL_METHOD ,BAS.STD_CAPITAL ,BAS.FIXED_CASH ,BAS.FLOWRATE_YN FROM KC_ETP.TD_INDEX_BASIC BAS WHERE BAS.F16013 = #{jisu_cd} and BAS.MARKET_ID = #{market_id} AND BAS.large_type = #{large_type}

SELECT date_format(B.F12506, "%Y.%m.%d") as trd_dd, B.F15001 as close_idx FROM td_index_basic A, td_index_hist B WHERE A.F16013 = B.F16013 AND A.MARKET_ID = B.MARKET_ID AND A.F16013 = #{jisu_cd} AND A.MARKET_ID = #{market_id} AND A.large_type = #{large_type}
AND B.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
AND B.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK), '%Y%m%d')
AND B.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m%d')
AND B.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH), '%Y%m%d')
AND B.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH), '%Y%m%d')
AND B.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y%m%d')
AND B.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m%d')
